byline.contributor: Frances Robles reported from Miami, and Christine Hauser from New York.
byline.original: By FRANCES ROBLES and CHRISTINE HAUSER

abstract: News conference held by family and lawyers of Corey Jones in West Palm Beach, Fla, reveals some of first details about fatal encounter Jones had with Police Officer Nouman K Raja; Jones's death is latest in series of fatal shootings by police officers of black Americans.
lead_paragraph: Corey Jones was stranded on the side of a highway when he was shot dead by the plainclothes officer, Nouman K. Raja.

headline.main: Lawyers Provide Details in Police Shooting of Corey Jones in Florida
headline.print_headline: Lawyers and Family Provide Details in Police Shooting of Florida Man

snippet: Corey Jones was stranded on the side of a highway when he was shot dead by the plainclothes officer, Nouman K. Raja.
